item.title: Building your own Tower
item.description: TL;DR Before starting with a new build, know what you would like to use it for. Make sure to be aware if you need certain hardware for specific tasks (e.g.Â NVIDIA for deep learning). Check some websites to minimize compatibility issues (e.g. pc partpicker or logical increments) as well as the compatibility guidelines of your mobo. There are plenty youtube tutorials, which are quite handy in terms of assembling guidelines (e.
